content: आक्रमः, --मणं {@--1@} Coming near, approaching. {@--2@} Falling upon, attacking; an attack; <ls>Śi. 16. 34.</ls> {@--3@} Seizing, taking, covering, occupying. {@--4@} Overcoming; obtaining. {@--5@} Spreading or going over, surpassing. {@--6@} Overloading. {@--7@} Might, valour. {@--8@} Possession of learning &c. {@--9@} Food.
